docs.title: Prerequesites
docs.text:
• A basic understanding of computers
  • Logical thinking abilities
  • A computer or VM with administrative permissions

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
NodeJS Website Download "LTS 20.XX.XX" Installer Open Installation Manager and Finish Steps

After installing, run: - node -v result should be 20.XX.XX - npm -v result should be 10.XX.XX To check the version

docs.title: Explanation
docs.text: Nodejs is the Javascript Runtime. It also comes with the node package manager (npm), which can install dependencies and more. Install dependencies: npm install OR npm i
